blogPost.excerpt: Prop Hero is an interactive gaming platform that allows fans of live sports to compete in the action by correctly predicting what is going to happen while they watch. Prop Hero can be embedded into broadcast streams or used as a second screen experience.
blogPost.body: Prop Hero is an interactive gaming platform that allows fans of live sports to compete in the action by correctly predicting what is going to happen while they watch. Prop Hero can be embedded into broadcast streams or used as a second screen experience.
blogPost.title: Prop Hero - Interactive predictor games for live sports
blogPost.author: Daniel Greenberg

localize.description: Prop Hero是一个互动游戏平台，让体育直播的粉丝们在观看的同时，通过正确预测将要发生的事情来进行竞争。Prop Hero可以嵌入到直播流中，也可以作为第二屏体验使用。
localize.tagline: 体育直播的互动预测游戏

localize.description: Prop Hero是一個互動遊戲平臺，讓體育直播的粉絲們在觀看的同時，通過正確預測將要發生的事情來進行競爭。Prop Hero可以嵌入到直播流中，也可以作爲第二屏體驗使用。
localize.tagline: 體育直播的互動預測遊戲

previous.excerpt: Weet is a video messaging tool that allows you to have asynchronous conversations with your team, partners, and customers. Weet includes instant recording, screen sharing, virtual background, video filters, emoji reactions, and rich comment options.
previous.title: Weet - Asynchronous video communication for remote teams

localize.description: Weet是一个视频消息工具，它允许您与您的团队、合作伙伴和客户进行异步对话。Weet包括即时录音、屏幕共享、虚拟背景、视频过滤器、表情符号反应和丰富的评论选项。
localize.tagline: 远程团队的异步视频通信

localize.description: Weet是一個視頻消息工具，它允許您與您的團隊、合作伙伴和客戶進行異步對話。Weet包括即時錄音、屏幕共享、虛擬背景、視頻過濾器、表情符號反應和豐富的評論選項。
localize.tagline: 遠程團隊的異步視頻通信

next.excerpt: Design Cell is a growing collection of elements and styles for iOS app creation. The first version includes more than 800 elements and 20 ready-to-use sample screens. Experience a convenient workflow in your favorite design area and get things done faster.
next.title: Design Cell - Beautiful multipurpose mockups for iOS

localize.description: Design Cell是一个不断增长的iOS应用创建元素和样式的集合。第一个版本包括800多个元素和20个随时可用的样屏。在您喜爱的设计区域体验便捷的工作流程，更快地完成任务。
localize.tagline: 美丽的iOS多用途模拟程序

localize.description: Design Cell是一個不斷增長的iOS應用創建元素和樣式的集合。第一個版本包括800多個元素和20個隨時可用的樣屏。在您喜愛的設計區域體驗便捷的工作流程，更快地完成任務。
localize.tagline: 美麗的iOS多用途模擬程序
